author: astrum3018
content: Hello everyone, I understand that this discord is about protocol R&D. Is there a place for discussing more philosophical crypto research like governance, the role of blockchain in society, privacy, etc?

author: astrum3018
content: If not, I'm thinking of starting one. Feel free to react if you'd be interested

author: alexssd7fp
content: Nothing like that thatâ€™s run by EF (I.e, official)

author: astrum3018
content: Gotcha, do you know why? Is it something they actively do not want to focus on?

author: alexssd7fp
content: Because there was never need for one. Core developer-centric governance works just fine for Ethereum

author: acid0003
content: start one, and you will quickly discover why they don't run one. Just have a glance through all the rules in this discord, and then imagine a discord with only the content phrohibited by those rules.

author: astrum3018
content: Gotcha. It wouldn't be specifically about ethereum governance. It would be about the idea of governance in general

author: astrum3018
content: Okay gotcha haha

author: alexssd7fp
content: Governance in crypto is a very controversial topic

author: astrum3018
content: Yea I agree, but it still seems important to discuss it and improve our understanding

author: astrum3018
content: What I have in mind is a forum where people would post thoughts like this: https://medium.com/@Vlad_Zamfir/against-on-chain-governance-a4ceacd040ca

author: astrum3018
content: And then have discussion about it

author: astrum3018
content: Right now it's mainly people posting things in various places and on their personal blogs, but it's not the most conducive to discussion

author: astrum3018
content: Like vitalik posts on his own blog without a comment section

author: astrum3018
content: Similar to the alignment forum: https://www.alignmentforum.org/, but for cryptoeconomics and cryptophilosophy

author: astrum3018
content: I did find https://www.smartcontractresearch.org/ which seems to be in a similar direction. Was surprised I hadn't heard of it before

author: alexssd7fp
content: Not sure if it will be popular, but yes, you can try starting one

content: I have a lot to say about governance for sure ðŸ˜„

author: astrum3018
